name: analyze_catering
description: Analyze the catering and food & beverage revenue potential for a hospitality property. Determines the recommended catering boost percentage based on market demand, event mix, property capabilities, and comparable properties. The catering boost represents the blended uplift to base F&B revenue from all catered events (weddings, corporate retreats, wellness retreats, private celebrations).
